review: I was lucky to get my son Ankle pain problem cured by him. He is polite, gentle,friendly, intelligent and has good hold over his subject. He properly satisfied our queries and doubt. Suggested precautions to be taken. Gives genuine advice. My son got relief right from first day. I pray him all the success in life.

review: I consulted doctor regarding my knee osteoarthritis problem. He thoroughly examined my position  & explained in detail the current status and suggested me the available remedial measures. I am fully satisfied with his approach & treatment.
**** **** ****** *** explained the issue very clearly and suggested proper treatment. I would highly recommend this doctor.
